ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package sour cream and onion dip
instructions: Cook spinach according to package directions; drain.
Combine turkey, gravy, onion dip and onion salt; spoon over spinach.
Bake, uncovered, at 325 degrees F for 25 minutes or until bubbly.
title: Turkey Florentine
steps: Cook spinach according to package directions; drain. Stir in butter. Place noodles in a greased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish; top with spinach. Combine turkey, gravy, onion dip and onion salt; spoon over spinach. Sprinkle with Parmesan. Bake, uncovered, at 325 degrees F for 25 minutes or until bubbly.
